pr_title: Alerting: Remove ruler from alert list view2 (#106778)

droid_missed: SilenceGrafanaRuleDrawer never renders for rules from list view

notes: All 3 droid comments were false positives - they claimed missing imports (ctx, t) that were actually present in the code. The droid appears to have made errors analyzing the imports. The golden comments caught 1 real bug (silence drawer not rendering) but also had 1 false positive (claiming missing key prop that was actually present).
